title: 请问一下怎么画材质
author: hexia1378
txt_content: ///F:/mcbox_game/instances/%E5%B0%8F%E6%B8%B8%E6%88%8F%E5%98%89%E5%B9%B4%E5%8D%8E(39)/o(%EF%BF%A3%E2%96%BD%EF%BF%A3)o0/assets/minecraft/textures/blocks/sandstone_top.png 这是图片地址 我想吧他换成滑稽

replies.author: hexia1378
replies.txt_content: 标题: 请问一下怎么画材质

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:

replies.author: kid小东
replies.txt_content: 你需要用画图。或者美图秀秀哪一类的画材质软件..
